short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily customize link previews on social media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more waiting for the IT department to edit code so you can share a page. With MetaShift you can customize your link preview yourself. Absolutely no coding.

When you customize a link with Metashift, you specify headlines, descriptions, images, and other meta data, and we save them as a Metashifted link which you share on social media. When people visit your Metashifted link, we automatically forward visitors to your original URL. Itâ€™s a seamless experience for your visitors, but gives you control over how the link is previewed. Win-win!
